alert.note: Alert for Burnet (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Burnet County through 600 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Copperas Cove to Watson to 6 miles east of Buchanan Lake Village. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Victor, Watson, Sunnylane and Briggs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas.
